articles.title: Rahul Gandhi to embark on padyatra from Kashmir to Kanyakumari

articles.author: AP
articles.title: North Korea reports 15 more suspected Covid-19 deaths
articles.description: North Korea has confirmed 15 more deaths and hundreds of thousands of additional patients with fevers as it mobilizes more than a million health and other workers to try to suppress the country’s first Covid-19 outbreak, state media reported on Sunday.

articles.description: North Korea's admission on Thursday that it is battling an "explosive" COVID-19 outbreak has raised concerns that the virus could devastate a country with an under-resourced health system, limited testing capabilities and no vaccine programme.
